project_question:
Racism exists in New York City.

A ‘Nigga Invention’ is a colloquialism for a work-around; a method for overcoming a difficult problem. In the context of this thesis, the problem is racism. The Nigga Inventions toolkit focuses on the survival of the black creative community in New York City from the exhaustion and distraction that is racism.

This thesis is a result of a continuing exploration into understanding what utopia means for marginalized communities. In an age of racist/ ableist/ transphobic/ heteronormative/ patriarchal/ capitalist/ xenophobic/ environmentally unjust/ religiously intolerant/ political leadership, I wanted to map the obstacles that prevent utopia from existing for vulnerable populations in the United States. Following a human-centered design process, the Nigga Inventions toolkit proposes a series of interventions for these obstacles. This thesis research is my own attempt at preventing erasure and creating utopia.
short_description: Nigga Inventions is a survival toolkit for the black community: a series of screen-based tools that focus on community, education, and access to reparations.
